channel.title: Comands stop working and how do you change what npcs say
channel.description:
ALL MY COMMANDS STOP WORKING AFTER I COMPILED/UPDATED
how do you change what npcs say

item.title: Comands stop working and how do you change what npcs say
item.dc:creator: @mrtube mrtube
item.description:
@mrtube wrote:

go into your npc.handler and search the npc id or the text of the npc you want to change for example

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1414) { if (misc.random2(22) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "pk box !!!comp every friday!!!"; } }

simply change the text within

npcs[i].textUpdate = "Choob Isle Dungeon Portal below me!";

say if you want the npc to say

awesome shop here it would look somthing like this

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1414) { if (misc.random2(22) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "awesome shop here!"; } }

DO NOT COPY AND PASTE MY NPC SPEECH because it wont work for the npc u want

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @piiwii piiwii
item.description:
@piiwii wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:14, topic:154575”][code] } else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
if(muted == 1) {
sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell!”);
} else {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5);
}
}

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
	if (amount > 0) {
		if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0) {
			if (!takeAsNote) {
				if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1]) {
					if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) {
						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) {
							bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount;
							resetBank();
							resetItems(5064);
						}
					} else {
						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),bankItemsN[fromSlot])) {
							bankItems[fromSlot] = 0;
							bankItemsN[fromSlot] = 0;
							resetBank();
							resetItems(5064);
						}
					}
				} else {
					while (amount>0) {
						if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > 0)
						{
									if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),1))
									{
										bankItemsN[fromSlot]+=-1;
										amount--;
									}
									else{
										amount = 0;
									}
						}
						else amount=0;
					}
					resetBank();
					resetItems(5064);
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

			else if (takeAsNote && Item.itemIsNote[bankItems[fromSlot]]) {
				//if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1])
				//{
					if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) {
						if (addItem(bankItems[fromSlot],amount)) {
							bankItemsN[fromSlot]-=amount;
							resetBank();
							resetItems(5064);
						}
					}
				//}
			}[/code]

ok can any one fix this compile error

[code]}
}

	if (amount > 0) {
		if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0){[/code]

item.title: Comands stop working and how do you change what npcs say
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[code] } else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
if(muted == 1) {
sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell!”);
} else {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5);
}
}

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
	if (amount > 0) {
		if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0) {
			if (!takeAsNote) {
				if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1]) {
					if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) {
						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) {
							bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount;
							resetBank();
							resetItems(5064);
						}
					} else {
						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),bankItemsN[fromSlot])) {
							bankItems[fromSlot] = 0;
							bankItemsN[fromSlot] = 0;
							resetBank();
							resetItems(5064);
						}
					}
				} else {
					while (amount>0) {
						if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > 0)
						{
									if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),1))
									{
										bankItemsN[fromSlot]+=-1;
										amount--;
									}
									else{
										amount = 0;
									}
						}
						else amount=0;
					}
					resetBank();
					resetItems(5064);
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

			else if (takeAsNote && Item.itemIsNote[bankItems[fromSlot]]) {
				//if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1])
				//{
					if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) {
						if (addItem(bankItems[fromSlot],amount)) {
							bankItemsN[fromSlot]-=amount;
							resetBank();
							resetItems(5064);
						}
					}
				//}
			}[/code]

l2indent.

I fixed the first bit up, couldn’t be bothered to fix the rest. But that should compile.

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {

		if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0){
			if (!takeAsNote) {
				if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1]) {
					if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) {
						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) {

							resetBank();
							resetItems(5064);

							bankItemsN[fromSlot] = 0;

									{
										bankItemsN[fromSlot]+=-1;
										amount--;
									}
									else{
										amount = 0;
									}

						else amount=0;
					}

					resetItems(5064);
				}
			}

			else if (takeAsNote && Item.itemIsNote[bankItems[fromSlot]])

item.title: Comands stop working and how do you change what npcs say
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Ok, I read too fast. Don’t ::update
Change something in your client.java, like the message sent whilst clicking a dummy. Save it, compile, and run. Log back in, and see if the message changed. If not, you may have multiples of the same file open.
